image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Arizona; born in Fort Monmouth, Monmouth County, N.J., June 11, 1958; graduated from Buena High School, Sierra Vista, Ariz.; B.S., Northern Arizona University, Flagstaff, Ariz., 1980; J.D., Catholic University, Washington, D.C., 2002; businessman; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighth Congress and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2003-January 3, 2009); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress in 2008; convicted on June 11, 2013, of conspiracy, money laundering, fraud, racketeering, and false statements; full pardon granted by President Donald J. Trump on January 19, 2021.
